revision.comment: [[WP:AES|←]]Created page with ''''David Siegel''' is an American motion picture screenwriter and director, and part of a long-standing writing-directing team with filmmaker [[Scott McGehee]]. Hi...'
added "(film)" to two film titles, so that links will link correctly
Robot: moving pages out of redirected category

revision.text:
'''David Siegel''' is an American motion picture screenwriter and director, and part of a long-standing writing-directing team with filmmaker [[Scott McGehee]]. His films include ''[[Suture (film)|Suture]]'' (1994), ''[[The Deep End (film)|The Deep End]]'' (2001), ''[[Bee Season (film)|Bee Season]]'' (2005) and ''[[Uncertainty (film)|Uncertainty]]'' (2008). '''David Siegel''' is a billionaire that is the CEO of West Gate Resort. ==External links== *{{imdb name|id=0796915|name=David Siegel}}
[[Category:American film directors|Siegel, David]] [[Category:American screenwriters|Siegel, David]] [[Category:Living people|Siegel, David]] [[Category:American Jews]]

revision.comment: adds a reference to a person with the same name
additional information in infobox, replaced dead interview with more recent
WLU moved page [[David Siegel]] to [[David Siegel (screenwriter)]]: Needs a DAB page
fixed redundancy (motion picture film director/motion picture screenwriter), filmograpyy into wikitable with additional films from imdb
added producing to description, conforming with his credits
